message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I believe it's a game-changer and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of a premium price for this exceptional item. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $1400000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and what I'm looking to get out of the deal.

I understand that the product is valuable, but I'm still not convinced that $1400000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $1100000. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
